LocationDescription: Between CFA and Tepper School of Business
Title: Krauss Campo
Artist: Mel Bochner and Michael Van Valkenburgh Associates
Notes: Gift of Jill Gansman Kraus (A '64) and Peter Krauss
Information: A unique collaboration combining art, landscape design and horticulture.It is both garden as sculpture and sculpture as garden. Quote from Wittgenstein on the nature of time., a simple form of encryption where the text has been been written word for word in reverse order. It takes a little time, and the text is about the passage of time.
